conjecture: An iterative preconditioned conjugate gradient solver can efficiently solve the mode-k RKHS-constrained CP decomposition subproblem [(Z kron K)^T S S^T (Z kron K) + lambda (I_r kron K)] vec(W) = (I_r kron K) vec(B), with matrix-vector products computable without O(N) cost and with a suitable preconditioner, achieving complexity better than the O(n^3 r^3) direct solve.
author: Tamara G. Kolda, Rachel Ward
